index.description: Index indicating the order of the set in the workout.

type.description: The type of set. This can be one of 'normal', 'warmup', 'dropset', 'failure'

reps.description: Number of reps logged for the set

distance_meters.description: Number of meters logged for the set

duration_seconds.description: Number of seconds logged for the set

rpe.description: RPE (Relative perceived exertion) value logged for the set

custom_metric.description: Custom metric logged for the set (Currently only used to log floors or steps for stair machine exercises)
